item.title: Windows 10 Settings - which one?
item.description: If you go to the search bar in Windows 10, and type “settings” - there are now at least three different places you might end up: The one on the left is “System Information”.Â It’s been around a while. You’ll notice it reports “version” as 10.0.15063. Top right, you get to from the classic Windows control panel / System. It shows we are version 10, but gives no other information.
